channel.title: Discussion of world 2 expanding
channel.description:
Im just saying it would be better if it was 1000 or so bigger Because started to build a castle then realise that the end of the world is like 20 blocks away from my castle and most town are close
like Pine Town i made a farm there about 10 away is end of world Found a under ground mine take a couple of steps end of world
Please at least think about making world 2 bigger

item.title: Discussion of world 2 expanding
item.dc:creator: @317guy 317guy
item.description:
@317guy wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:3, topic:421509”]I agree with xx matty xx.

There is more than enough free space to build anything.[/quote]
0.o Cant argue with an admin looks like im moving again lol

Read full topic

item.title: Discussion of world 2 expanding
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I agree with xx matty xx.

There is more than enough free space to build anything. It’s your own fault for not exploring the surrounding area before building, anyway the end of the map can be used for a defensive advantage.

Read full topic

item.title: Discussion of world 2 expanding
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

We still have loads of free space, and it’s supposed to be compact anyway.

I like it this way, it was so ridiculous when we had to take 10 minute train rides just to go to someones house.

Read full topic
